author: Fox News
title: Fox News Poll: Republicans maintain advantage in generic midterm ballot
description: In an early snapshot of the 2022 midterm elections, Republicans maintain a narrow advantage over Democrats on the generic congressional ballot -- as voters say they are less likely to support a candidate endorsed by either President Joe Biden or former Presid…
